content: this text is about a legal case involving a party who owes 116934 euros to someone else the case has been ongoing since february 19 2014 the court has divided the assets involved in the case with one party receiving 50 of the assets the document also mentions a meeting that took place on february 19 2016 where the parties agreed to divide the assets in a certain manner the mediation process was concluded and the document was signed and closed at 315 pm on february 19 2016
